description:
A well established player in the compliance management space is seeking a top performing salesperson to join their team in a Senior Sales Executive seat. This role is ideal for someone with an entrepreneurial streak who is motivated by the opportunity to bring in new clients to the firm as well as expand current accounts. You might consider applying if you are established in the world of RegTech or FinTech.

In the wake of a new software rollout, reinvesting in R&D, and their first successful acquisition, the team has committed to growing their client base and product suite globally in the years to come. In addition to joining one of the most flourishing company cultures in tech, you will work with one of the world's leading conduct risk platforms.

Primary Duties and Responsibilities Include:
• Identify and qualify prospects.
• Build relevant near- and long-term pipeline.
• Conduct prospecting activity (phone calls, emails) to middle and senior level prospects.
• Drive a lead generation plan, territory management plan, and a Closing plan.
• Continuously seek sales opportunities to support a healthy sales pipeline.
• Obtain appointments with qualified prospects.
• Uncover opportunities suitable for the platform.
• Manage the sales cycle from beginning to end.
• Position the sale against competition leveraging the companies strengths.
• Meet or exceed quarterly and annual targets and increase revenue within your territory.

Experience and Skills Required:
• Minimum 5 years of sales experience selling software solutions to financial markets.
• Ability to pick up and absorb technical information quickly and can demonstrate software solutions independently.
• Demonstrated prospecting capabilities.
• Ability to communicate and influence senior executives.
• Motivation to learn and results driven.
• Ability to interact and align solution with overall business strategy for customers in a range of roles from technical champions to C-level business buyers.
• Success as 'hunter' and 'closer'.

What's in it for you?
• Remote work schedule
• Growth opportunities within
• Wide range of company benefits
• Flexible work life balance
